Configuration.Name: L1=12m_L2=1p3m_central
Configuration.SetupScript: config.wavelength = 6 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 510 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g3' config.apx = -72 config.bs = 3 config.beamcenterx = 91.96 config.beamcenterz = 95.99 config.drive()
